text:
Both packages of the 4.1.10 distribution, standard and jdk1.4 keep version ID 
4.1.9 on startup.
creator: claus_maps_on@yahoo.com

text: When I d'l the 4.1.10 .exe and run it, there's written 4.1.10 on the screen.
creator: remm@apache.org

text:
I am using jakarta-tomcat-4.1.10.zip not the EXE installer.

I am speeking of the version in the startup window of Tomcat ...
